text: Golam Sarwar Hiru is an Islami Oikya Jote politician and the former Member of Parliament of Barguna-2. ==Career== Hiru was elected to parliament from Barguna-2 as an Islami Oikya Jote candidate in 1996. In the 7th Jatiya Sangshad session, he was the sole representative of Islami Oikya Front. He was threatened with expulsion for breaking party discipline. ==References== Category:Islami Oikya Jote politicians Category:Living people Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Golam Sarwar Hiru
